#summary Links to the manuals for LinqToRdf
= Introduction =

There are two manuals available for LinqToRdf:

  * The [http://code.google.com/p/linqtordf/source/browse/trunk/doc/manual/linqtordf-manual.pdf LinqToRdf Manual]
  * The [http://code.google.com/p/linqtordf/source/browse/trunk/doc/manual/rdfmetal-manual.pdf RdfMetal Manual]
